column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Went here with a group last week
column2: a few from out of town.  So where do you take someone from out of town
column3: Lou Malnati's of course.  Everyone loved the pizzas!  Stuffed spinach bread and comb. platters are great starters.  Malnati's salad is goes along great with the pizzas.  Never been disappointed.
